about_the_game:
Adds a completely new adaptation of Julius Caesar, this time with a Christmas twist!

Experience the tale of Julius Caesar, only now he's Santa Claus!
Witness the internal turmoil of Brutus, only now they are Krampus!

Listen as Robin Puck tells the tale of your secret mission to assassinate the Spirit of Christmas, as only Shakespeare could tell it!

An instant holiday classic for all ages!

To play:

- Go through Non-Shakespeare Mode first, then Xmas Mode should open up at the start of the game.
detailed_description:
Adds a completely new adaptation of Julius Caesar, this time with a Christmas twist!

Experience the tale of Julius Caesar, only now he's Santa Claus!
Witness the internal turmoil of Brutus, only now they are Krampus!

Listen as Robin Puck tells the tale of your secret mission to assassinate the Spirit of Christmas, as only Shakespeare could tell it!

An instant holiday classic for all ages!

To play:

- Go through Non-Shakespeare Mode first, then Xmas Mode should open up at the start of the game.

short_description: Shakespeare's Brutus and Cassius are out to assassinate Santa Claus. This DLC is just a whole lot of holiday trauma.
